text: The 2016 Thindown Challenger Biella is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor red clay courts. It is part of the 2016 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Biella, Italy between 25 – 31 July 2016. ==Entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | | Paolo Lorenzi | 48 | 1 |- | | Thomaz Bellucci | 49 | 2 |- | | Dušan Lajović | 83 | 3 |- | | Carlos Berlocq | 87 | 4 |- | | Karen Khachanov | 104 | 5 |- | | Andrej Martin | 124 | 6 |- | | Marco Trungelliti | 130 | 7 |- | | Daniel Brands | 135 | 8 |} * Rankings are as of July 18, 2016. ===Other Entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Paolo Lorenzi * Gianluca Mager * Stefano Napolitano * Gianluigi Quinzi The following player received entry into the singles main draw as a special exempt: * Aslan Karatsev The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Tomislav Brkić * Andrea Collarini * Viktor Galović * Francisco Bahamonde ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Federico Gaio def. Thomaz Bellucci 7–6(7–5), 6–2. ===Doubles=== * Andre Begemann / Leander Paes def. Andrej Martin / Hans Podlipnik 6–4, 6–4. ==External links== *Official website *ITF search Thindown Challenger Biella Category:Tennis tournaments in Italy
title: 2016 Thindown Challenger Biella
